channel.title: Caribou County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Caribou County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-34 South - Grace
item.description: Entering Grace on ID-34 south.

item.title: ID-34 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-34 south. Distance to Grace, Preston, and Logan (Utah).

item.title: ID-34 South - Pioneer Historic Byway
item.description: ID-34 South/Pioneer Historic Byway in Caribou County.

item.title: US-30 East at ID-34
item.description: US-30 east at ID-34 in Caribou County.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching ID-34
item.description: US-30 East approaching ID-34 south to Grace. Continue east on US-30 for Soda Springs and Montpelier. ID-34 north joins US-30 eastbound to Soda Springs.

item.title: US-30 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 east. Distance to Georgetown, Montpelier, and Kemmerer (Wyoming).

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North at US-30/ID-34 Split
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 North at US-30/ID-34 split in Soda Springs. Turn left to continue north on ID-34. The ID-34 shield pictured here is the new style of Idaho state highway shield.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North Approaching US-30/ID-34 Split
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 North approaching US-30/ID-34 split in Soda Springs. Turn left for ID-34 north to Wayan and Jackson (Wyoming). Continue east on US-30 for Georgetown and Montpelier.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North - Soda Springs
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 North approaching US-30/ID-34 split in Soda Springs.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 East/ID-34 North. Distance to Soda Springs, Georgetown, and Montpelier.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching ID-34
item.description: US-30 East approaching ID-34 in Caribou County. ID-34 joins US-30 eastbound into Soda Springs.

item.title: US-30 West - Fish Creek Summit
item.description: US-30 west at Fish Creek Summit.

item.title: US-30 West/ID-34 South - Distance Marker
item.description: US-30 West/ID-34 South Distance Marker. Distance to Lava Hot Springs, Grace, Pocatello.

item.title: ID-34 South at US-30
item.description: ID-34 South at US-30. Turn left for US-30 west to Montpelier. Turn right for US-30 east to Pocatello and ID-34 south to Preston.

item.title: ID-34 South Approaching US-30
item.description: ID-34 South approaching US-30 in Soda Springs. ID-34 south joins US-30 east through Soda Springs.

item.title: ID-34 South - Soda Springs
item.description: ID-34 south (East Hooper Ave.) at S. 3rd St. Turn left to continue south on ID-34.

item.title: ID-34 South - Soda Springs
item.description: Entering Soda Springs on ID-34 south. Population 3058. Soda Springs is the county seat of Caribou County.

item.title: ID-34 South - Caribou County
item.description: ID-34 South in Caribou County. The shield is brown because it is part of the scenic/historic byway system, in this case the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: ID-34 South - Conda Jct.
item.description: ID-34 south at Conda Jct.

item.title: ID-34 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-34 south. Distance to Conda Jct., Soda Springs, and Preston.

item.title: ID-34 South - Grays Lake Road Jct.
item.description: ID-34 South at Grays Lake Road Jct. Turn right for Grays Lake National Wildlife Refuge.

item.title: ID-34 South - Gray
item.description: ID-34 south at Grays Lake Road north to Gray.

item.title: ID-34 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-34 south. Distance to Henry, Conda, and Soda Springs.

item.title: ID-34 South - Wayan
item.description: Entering Wayan on ID-34 south.

item.title: US-30 West at ID-34
item.description: US-30 west at ID-34 north to Wayan and Jackson. ID-34 joins US-30 west through Soda Springs towards McCammon and Pocatello.

item.title: US-30 West at ID-34
item.description: US-30 west at ID-34 in Soda Springs. Turn right on ID-34 north for Afton and Jackson (both in Wyoming). ID-34 joins US-30 west through Soda Springs. Continue west on US-30/ID-34 for McCammon and Pocatello. ID-34 is part of the Pioneer Historic Byway, which is why the shield is a brown color.

item.title: US-30 West/ID-34 South At ID-34
item.description: US-30 West/ID-34 South at ID-34. Turn left for ID-34 south to Grace; turn right on county road to Bancroft. Continue straight ahead for US-30 west to Pocatello.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 South Approaching ID-34
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 South approaching US-30/ID-34 split in Bannock County.

item.title: US-30 East - Oregon Trail Bear Lake Scenic Byway
item.description: US-30 East in Soda Springs - Oregon Trail - Bear Lake Scenic Byway.

item.title: ID-34 South - Soda Springs
item.description: ID-34 south (East Hooper Ave.) at North 3rd St. Turn left to continue south on ID-34.

item.title: ID-34 South - Pioneer Historic Byway
item.description: ID-34 south in Caribou County - Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: ID-34 South - Scenic Byways
item.description: ID-34 Shield, Bear Lake-Caribou Scenic Byway, and Pioneer Historic Byway. Taken at the Idaho/Wyoming Border in the Star Valley.
